H0.text: Aberdeen in Scotland is known as the (Which rock?) City. Basalt

H1.text: Aberdeen in Scotland is known as the (Which rock?) City. Sandstone

H2.text: Aberdeen in Scotland is known as the (Which rock?) City. Limestone

H3.text: Aberdeen in Scotland is known as the (Which rock?) City. Granite

A4.text: Aberdeen's buildings incorporated locally quarried grey granite, which may sparkle like silver because of its high mica content.
